 1915: eep49(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1916:     check(fun() ->
 1917:                   maybe empty end
 1918:           end,
 1919:           "maybe empty end.",
 1920:           empty),
 1921:     check(fun() ->
 1922:                   maybe ok ?= ok end
 1923:           end,
 1924:           "maybe ok ?= ok end.",
 1925:           ok),
 1926:     check(fun() ->
 1927:                   maybe {ok,A} ?= {ok,good}, A end
 1928:           end,
 1929:           "maybe {ok,A} ?= {ok,good}, A end.",
 1930:           good),
 1931:     check(fun() ->
 1932:                   maybe {ok,A} ?= {ok,good}, {ok,B} ?= {ok,also_good}, {A,B} end
 1933:           end,
 1934:           "maybe {ok,A} ?= {ok,good}, {ok,B} ?= {ok,also_good}, {A,B} end.",
 1935:           {good,also_good}),
 1936:     check(fun() ->
 1937:                   maybe {ok,A} ?= {ok,good}, {ok,B} ?= {error,wrong}, {A,B} end
 1938:           end,
 1939:           "maybe {ok,A} ?= {ok,good}, {ok,B} ?= {error,wrong}, {A,B} end.",
 1940:           {error,wrong}),
 1941: 
 1942:     %% Test maybe ... else ... end.
 1943:     check(fun() ->
 1944:                   maybe empty else _ -> error end
 1945:           end,
 1946:           "maybe empty else _ -> error end.",
 1947:           empty),
 1948:     check(fun() ->
 1949:                   maybe ok ?= ok else _ -> error end
 1950:           end,
 1951:           "maybe ok ?= ok else _ -> error end.",
 1952:           ok),
 1953:     check(fun() ->
 1954:                   maybe ok ?= other else _ -> error end
 1955:           end,
 1956:           "maybe ok ?= other else _ -> error end.",
 1957:           error),
 1958:     check(fun() ->
 1959:                   maybe {ok,A} ?= {ok,good}, {ok,B} ?= {ok,also_good}, {A,B}
 1960:                   else {error,_} -> error end
 1961:           end,
 1962:           "maybe {ok,A} ?= {ok,good}, {ok,B} ?= {ok,also_good}, {A,B} "
 1963:           "else {error,_} -> error end.",
 1964:           {good,also_good}),
 1965:     check(fun() ->
 1966:                   maybe {ok,A} ?= {ok,good}, {ok,B} ?= {error,other}, {A,B}
 1967:                   else {error,_} -> error end
 1968:           end,
 1969:           "maybe {ok,A} ?= {ok,good}, {ok,B} ?= {error,other}, {A,B} "
 1970:           "else {error,_} -> error end.",
 1971:           error),
 1972:     error_check("maybe ok ?= simply_wrong else {error,_} -> error end.",
 1973:                 {else_clause,simply_wrong}),
 1974:     ok.
 1975: 
 1976: %% GH-6348/OTP-18297: Lift restrictions for matching of binaries and maps.
 1977: binary_and_map_aliases(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1978:     check(fun() ->
 1979:                   <<A:16>> = <<B:8,C:8>> = <<16#cafe:16>>,
 1980:                   {A,B,C}
 1981:           end,
 1982:           "begin <<A:16>> = <<B:8,C:8>> = <<16#cafe:16>>, {A,B,C} end.",
 1983:           {16#cafe,16#ca,16#fe}),
 1984:     check(fun() ->
 1985:                   <<A:8/bits,B:24/bits>> =
 1986:                       <<C:16,D:16>> =
 1987:                       <<E:8,F:8,G:8,H:8>> =
 1988:                       <<16#abcdef57:32>>,
 1989:                   {A,B,C,D,E,F,G,H}
 1990:           end,
 1991:           "begin <<A:8/bits,B:24/bits>> =
 1992:                  <<C:16,D:16>> =
 1993:                  <<E:8,F:8,G:8,H:8>> =
 1994:                  <<16#abcdef57:32>>,
 1995:                  {A,B,C,D,E,F,G,H}
 1996:            end.",
 1997:           {<<16#ab>>,<<16#cdef57:24>>, 16#abcd,16#ef57, 16#ab,16#cd,16#ef,16#57}),
 1998:     check(fun() ->
 1999:                   #{K := V} = #{k := K} = #{k => my_key, my_key => 42},
 2000:                   V
 2001:           end,
 2002:           "begin #{K := V} = #{k := K} = #{k => my_key, my_key => 42}, V end.",
 2003:           42),
 2004:     ok.
 2005: 
 2006: %% EEP 58: Map comprehensions.
 2007: eep58(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2008:     check(fun() -> X = 32, #{X => X*X || X <- [1,2,3]} end,
 2009: 	  "begin X = 32, #{X => X*X || X <- [1,2,3]} end.",
 2010: 	  #{1 => 1, 2 => 4, 3 => 9}),
 2011:     check(fun() ->
 2012:                   K = V = none,
 2013:                   #{K => V*V || K := V <- #{1 => 1, 2 => 2, 3 => 3}}
 2014:           end,
 2015:           "begin K = V = none, #{K => V*V || K := V <- #{1 => 1, 2 => 2, 3 => 3}} end.",
 2016: 	  #{1 => 1, 2 => 4, 3 => 9}),
 2017:     check(fun() ->
 2018:                   #{K => V*V || K := V <- maps:iterator(#{1 => 1, 2 => 2, 3 => 3})}
 2019:           end,
 2020:           "#{K => V*V || K := V <- maps:iterator(#{1 => 1, 2 => 2, 3 => 3})}.",
 2021: 	  #{1 => 1, 2 => 4, 3 => 9}),
 2022:     check(fun() -> << <<K:8,V:24>> || K := V <- #{42 => 7777} >> end,
 2023:           "<< <<K:8,V:24>> || K := V <- #{42 => 7777} >>.",
 2024: 	  <<42:8,7777:24>>),
 2025:     check(fun() -> [X || X := X <- #{a => 1, b => b}] end,
 2026:           "[X || X := X <- #{a => 1, b => b}].",
 2027: 	  [b]),
 2028: 
 2029:     error_check("[K+V || K := V <- a].", {bad_generator,a}),
 2030:     error_check("[K+V || K := V <- [-1|#{}]].", {bad_generator,[-1|#{}]}),
 2031: 
 2032:     ok.
 2033: 
 2034: strict_generators(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2035:     %% Basic scenario for each comprehension and generator type
 2036:     check(fun() -> [X+1 || X <:- [1,2,3]] end,
 2037:           "[X+1 || X <:- [1,2,3]].",
 2038:           [2,3,4]),
 2039:     check(fun() -> [X+1 || <<X>> <:= <<1,2,3>>] end,
 2040:           "[X+1 || <<X>> <:= <<1,2,3>>].",
 2041:           [2,3,4]),
 2042:     check(fun() -> [X*Y || X := Y <:- #{1 => 2, 3 => 4}] end,
 2043:           "[X*Y || X := Y <:- #{1 => 2, 3 => 4}].",
 2044:           [2,12]),
 2045:     check(fun() -> << <<(X+1)>> || X <:- [1,2,3]>> end,
 2046:           "<< <<(X+1)>> || X <:- [1,2,3]>>.",
 2047:           <<2,3,4>>),
 2048:     check(fun() -> << <<(X+1)>> || <<X>> <:= <<1,2,3>> >> end,
 2049:           "<< <<(X+1)>> || <<X>> <:= <<1,2,3>> >>.",
 2050:           <<2,3,4>>),
 2051:     check(fun() -> << <<(X*Y)>> || X := Y <:- #{1 => 2, 3 => 4} >> end,
 2052:           "<< <<(X*Y)>> || X := Y <:- #{1 => 2, 3 => 4} >>.",
 2053:           <<2,12>>),
 2054:     check(fun() -> #{X => X+1 || X <:- [1,2,3]} end,
 2055:           "#{X => X+1 || X <:- [1,2,3]}.",
 2056:           #{1 => 2, 2 => 3, 3 => 4}),
 2057:     check(fun() -> #{X => X+1 || <<X>> <:= <<1,2,3>>} end,
 2058:           "#{X => X+1 || <<X>> <:= <<1,2,3>>}.",
 2059:           #{1 => 2, 2 => 3, 3 => 4}),
 2060:     check(fun() -> #{X+1 => Y*2 || X := Y <:- #{1 => 2, 3 => 4}} end,
 2061:           "#{X+1 => Y*2 || X := Y <:- #{1 => 2, 3 => 4}}.",
 2062:           #{2 => 4, 4 => 8}),
 2063:     %% A failing guard following a strict generator is ok
 2064:     check(fun() -> [X+1 || X <:- [1,2,3], X > 1] end,
 2065:           "[X+1 || X <:- [1,2,3], X > 1].",
 2066:           [3,4]),
 2067:     check(fun() -> [X+1 || <<X>> <:= <<1,2,3>>, X > 1] end,
 2068:           "[X+1 || <<X>> <:= <<1,2,3>>, X > 1].",
 2069:           [3,4]),
 2070:     check(fun() -> [X*Y || X := Y <:- #{1 => 2, 3 => 4}, X > 1] end,
 2071:           "[X*Y || X := Y <:- #{1 => 2, 3 => 4}, X > 1].",
 2072:           [12]),
 2073:     check(fun() -> << <<(X+1)>> || X <:- [1,2,3], X > 1>> end,
 2074:           "<< <<(X+1)>> || X <:- [1,2,3], X > 1>>.",
 2075:           <<3,4>>),
 2076:     check(fun() -> << <<(X+1)>> || <<X>> <:= <<1,2,3>>, X > 1 >> end,
 2077:           "<< <<(X+1)>> || <<X>> <:= <<1,2,3>>, X > 1 >>.",
 2078:           <<3,4>>),
 2079:     check(fun() -> << <<(X*Y)>> || X := Y <:- #{1 => 2, 3 => 4}, X > 1 >> end,
 2080:           "<< <<(X*Y)>> || X := Y <:- #{1 => 2, 3 => 4}, X > 1 >>.",
 2081:           <<12>>),
 2082:     check(fun() -> #{X => X+1 || X <:- [1,2,3], X > 1} end,
 2083:           "#{X => X+1 || X <:- [1,2,3], X > 1}.",
 2084:           #{2 => 3, 3 => 4}),
 2085:     check(fun() -> #{X => X+1 || <<X>> <:= <<1,2,3>>, X > 1} end,
 2086:           "#{X => X+1 || <<X>> <:= <<1,2,3>>, X > 1}.",
 2087:           #{2 => 3, 3 => 4}),
 2088:     check(fun() -> #{X+1 => Y*2 || X := Y <:- #{1 => 2, 3 => 4}, X > 1} end,
 2089:           "#{X+1 => Y*2 || X := Y <:- #{1 => 2, 3 => 4}, X > 1}.",
 2090:           #{4 => 8}),
 2091:     %% Non-matching elements cause a badmatch error
 2092:     error_check("[X || {ok, X} <:- [{ok,1},2,{ok,3}]].",
 2093:                 {badmatch,2}),
 2094:     error_check("[X || <<0:1, X:7>> <:= <<1,128,2>>].",
 2095:                 {badmatch,<<128,2>>}),
 2096:     error_check("[X || X := ok <:- #{1 => ok, 2 => error, 3 => ok}].",
 2097:                 {badmatch,{2,error}}),
 2098:     error_check("<< <<X>> || {ok, X} <:- [{ok,1},2,{ok,3}] >>.",
 2099:                 {badmatch,2}),
 2100:     error_check("<< <<X>> || <<0:1, X:7>> <:= <<1,128,2>> >>.",
 2101:                 {badmatch,<<128,2>>}),
 2102:     error_check("<< <<X>> || X := ok <:- #{1 => ok, 2 => error, 3 => ok} >>.",
 2103:                 {badmatch,{2,error}}),
 2104:     error_check("#{X => X+1 || {ok, X} <:- [{ok,1},2,{ok,3}]}.",
 2105:                 {badmatch,2}),
 2106:     error_check("#{X => X+1 || <<0:1, X:7>> <:= <<1,128,2>>}.",
 2107:                 {badmatch,<<128,2>>}),
 2108:     error_check("#{X => X+1 || X := ok <:- #{1 => ok, 2 => error, 3 => ok}}.",
 2109:                 {badmatch,{2,error}}),
 2110:     %% Binary generators don't allow unused bits at the end either
 2111:     error_check("[X || <<X:3>> <:= <<0>>].",
 2112:                 {badmatch,<<0:2>>}),
 2113:     error_check("[Y || <<X, Y:X>> <:= <<8,1,9,2>>].",
 2114:                 {badmatch,<<9,2>>}),
 2115:     ok.
 2116: 
 2117: %% Check the string in different contexts: as is; in fun; from compiled code.
 2118: check(F, String, Result) ->
 2119:     check1(F, String, Result),
 2120:     FunString = concat(["fun() -> ", no_final_dot(String), " end(). "]),
 2121:     check1(F, FunString, Result),
 2122:     CompileString = concat(["hd(lists:map(fun(_) -> ", no_final_dot(String),
 2123:                             " end, [foo])). "]),
 2124:     check1(F, CompileString, Result).
 2125: 
 2126: check1(F, String, Result) ->
 2127:     Result = F(),
 2128:     Expr = parse_expr(String),
 2129:     case catch erl_eval:expr(Expr, []) of
 2130:         {value, Result, Bs} when is_list(Bs) ->
 2131:             ok;
 2132:         Other1 ->
 2133:             ct:fail({eval, Other1, Result})
 2134:     end,
 2135:     case catch erl_eval:expr(Expr, #{}) of
 2136:         {value, Result, MapBs} when is_map(MapBs) ->
 2137:             ok;
 2138:         Other2 ->
 2139:             ct:fail({eval, Other2, Result})
 2140:     end.
 2141: 
 2142: check(F, String, Result, BoundVars, LFH, EFH) ->
 2143:     Result = F(),
 2144:     Exprs = parse_exprs(String),
 2145:     case catch erl_eval:exprs(Exprs, [], LFH, EFH) of
 2146:         {value, Result, Bs} ->
 2147:             %% We just assume that Bs is an orddict...
 2148:             Keys = orddict:fetch_keys(Bs),
 2149:             case sort(BoundVars) == sort(Keys) of
 2150:                 true ->
 2151:                     ok;
 2152:                 false ->
 2153:                     ct:fail({check, BoundVars, Keys})
 2154:             end,
 2155:             ok;
 2156:         Other1 ->
 2157:             ct:fail({check, Other1, Result})
 2158:     end,
 2159:     case catch erl_eval:exprs(Exprs, #{}, LFH, EFH) of
 2160:         {value, Result, MapBs} ->
 2161:             MapKeys = maps:keys(MapBs),
 2162:             case sort(BoundVars) == sort(MapKeys) of
 2163:                 true ->
 2164:                     ok;
 2165:                 false ->
 2166:                     ct:fail({check, BoundVars, MapKeys})
 2167:             end,
 2168:             ok;
 2169:         Other2 ->
 2170:             ct:fail({check, Other2, Result})
 2171:     end.
 2172: 
 2173: error_check(String, Result) ->
 2174:     Expr = parse_expr(String),
 2175:     case catch erl_eval:expr(Expr, []) of
 2176:         {'EXIT', {Result,_}} ->
 2177:             ok;
 2178:         Other1 ->
 2179:             ct:fail({eval, Other1, Result})
 2180:     end,
 2181:     case catch erl_eval:expr(Expr, #{}) of
 2182:         {'EXIT', {Result,_}} ->
 2183:             ok;
 2184:         Other2 ->
 2185:             ct:fail({eval, Other2, Result})
 2186:     end.
 2187: 
 2188: error_check(String, Result, LFH, EFH) ->
 2189:     Exprs = parse_exprs(String),
 2190:     case catch erl_eval:exprs(Exprs, [], LFH, EFH) of
 2191:         {'EXIT', {Result,_}} ->
 2192:             ok;
 2193:         Other1 ->
 2194:             ct:fail({eval, Other1, Result})
 2195:     end,
 2196:     case catch erl_eval:exprs(Exprs, #{}, LFH, EFH) of
 2197:         {'EXIT', {Result,_}} ->
 2198:             ok;
 2199:         Other2 ->
 2200:             ct:fail({eval, Other2, Result})
 2201:     end.
 2202: 
 2203: backtrace_check(String, Result, Backtrace) ->
 2204:     case catch parse_and_run(String) of
 2205:         {'EXIT', {Result, BT}} ->
 2206:             check_backtrace(Backtrace, remove_error_info(BT));
 2207:         Other ->
 2208:             ct:fail({eval, Other, Result})
 2209:     end.
 2210: 
 2211: backtrace_check(String, Result, Backtrace, LFH, EFH) ->
 2212:     case catch parse_and_run(String, LFH, EFH) of
 2213:         {'EXIT', {Result, BT}} ->
 2214:             check_backtrace(Backtrace, remove_error_info(BT));
 2215:         Other ->
 2216:             ct:fail({eval, Other, Result})
 2217:     end.
 2218: 
 2219: remove_error_info([{M, F, As, Info} | T]) ->
 2220:     [{M, F, As, lists:keydelete(error_info, 1, Info)} | T].
 2221: 
 2222: backtrace_catch(String, Result, Backtrace) ->
 2223:     case parse_and_run(String) of
 2224:         {value, {'EXIT', {Result, BT}}, _Bindings} ->
 2225:             check_backtrace(Backtrace, remove_error_info(BT));
 2226:         Other ->
 2227:             ct:fail({eval, Other, Result})
 2228:     end.
 2229: 
 2230: error_info_catch(String, Result) ->
 2231:     case catch parse_and_run(String) of
 2232:         {'EXIT', {Result, [{_, _, _, Info}|_]}} ->
 2233:             lists:keyfind(error_info, 1, Info);
 2234:         Other ->
 2235:             ct:fail({eval, Other, Result})
 2236:     end.
 2237: 
 2238: check_backtrace([B1|Backtrace], [B2|BT]) ->
 2239:     case {B1, B2} of
 2240:         {M, {M,_,_,_}} ->
 2241:             ok;
 2242:         {{M,F,A}, {M,F,A,_}} ->
 2243:             ok;
 2244:         {B, B} ->
 2245:             ok
 2246:     end,
 2247:     check_backtrace(Backtrace, BT);
 2248: check_backtrace([], _) ->
 2249:     ok.
 2250: 
 2251: eval_string(String) ->
 2252:     {value, Result, _} = parse_and_run(String),
 2253:     Result.
 2254: 
 2255: parse_expr(String) ->
 2256:     Tokens = erl_scan_string(String),
 2257:     {ok, [Expr]} = erl_parse:parse_exprs(Tokens),
 2258:     Expr.
 2259: 
 2260: parse_exprs(String) ->
 2261:     Tokens = erl_scan_string(String),
 2262:     {ok, Exprs} = erl_parse:parse_exprs(Tokens),
 2263:     Exprs.
 2264: 
 2265: erl_scan_string(String) ->
 2266:     %% FIXME: When the experimental features EEP has been implemented, we should
 2267:     %% dig out all keywords defined in all features.
 2268:     ResWordFun =
 2269:         fun('maybe') -> true;
 2270:            ('else') -> true;
 2271:            (Other) -> erl_scan:reserved_word(Other)
 2272:         end,
 2273:     {ok,Tokens,_} = erl_scan:string(String, 1, [{reserved_word_fun,ResWordFun}]),
 2274:     Tokens.
 2275: 
 2276: parse_and_run(String) ->
 2277:     erl_eval:expr(parse_expr(String), []).
 2278: 
 2279: parse_and_run(String, LFH, EFH) ->
 2280:     erl_eval:exprs(parse_exprs(String), [], LFH, EFH).
 2281: 
 2282: no_final_dot(S) ->
 2283:     case lists:reverse(S) of
 2284:         " ." ++ R -> lists:reverse(R);
 2285:         "." ++ R -> lists:reverse(R);
 2286:         _ -> S
 2287:     end.
